A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a huge Star Wars fan. Loved Force Awakens!
This movie however was clearly written by someon who in spite of all the lavish praise and heaps of comments about how this is "THE GUY"!\, he just didn't get it. He clearly set out to write a very different and unexpected at every turn Star Wars. He succeeded how different didn't equal good. 
He blew almost every interest with regard to plot left over from Force Awakens. The biggest crime honestly is that he managed to execute all the most climactic parts in a way that were anything but climactic. Had to ask myself
Wait.....did that person just die? Not exactly a sign of an experienced director. Disney better rethink a new trilogy with him at the helm. 
Lastly\, Disney is pushing this Cell phone game. You see a commercial for it prior to movie. Theme of "you can be any character you want in Star Wars just believe!" Then at the very end of the movie it's some Random kid believing in the Force. Just stupid. A total obvious marketing tie in. Dumb. 
No interest in seeing next movie.
